Name: Idle Hands
Effect Text: Argo loses -1 @Crew

Name: Cow Toss
Effect Text: Furthest Titan suffers {Knockdown}, raise @Danger to 9, and draws an Obol. Hekaton moves adjacent to Closest Titan with Unlimited @Speed

Name: The Call
Flavor: Labyrinthauros pauses to sing the song of surrender. Many listen
Effect Text: Argo loses -1 @Crew

Name: Contract
Flavor: Temenos's body contracts, becoming an impenetrable shell
Effect Text: Temenos gains 1 postiive @AT token. Discard this token after the next Temenos attack

Name: Contract Will
Flavor: Temenos's body contracts, becoming an impenetrable shell
Effect Text: Each Titan gains 1 Despair token. Temenos gains 1 postiive @AT token. Discard this token after the next Temenos attack

Name: Eyes On The Prize
Flavor: The Pursuer remembers why it came here
Effect Text: Pursuer moves to the center of the Board and turns to face the most Titans. Lose -1 @Crew and -1 @Hull

Name: Ambrosia: Harrow
Effect Text: Each Titan gains as many @Fate as they have Ambrosia tokens. If this ability didn't trigger, the Pursuer moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans, and performs Signature

Name: Ambrosia: Burnout
Effect Text: Each Titan gains as many @Danger as they have Ambrosia tokens. If this ability didn't trigger, the Pursuer moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans, and performs Signature

Name: Ambrosia: Stain
Effect Text: Each Titan assigns all of their Ambrosia tokens to their Titan Sheet, Kratos Table, or to any of their @Gear or Mnemos cards (up to 1 token on each element). Treat these elements' ability text as blank. These Ambrosia tokens still count towards the Ambrosia Limit. If this ability didn't trigger, the Pursuer moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans, and performs Signature

Name: Ambrosia: Drain
Effect Text: If there are 3+ Ambrosia tokens in total on all Titans, the Pursuer performs Heal. If this ability didn't trigger, Pursuer moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans, and performs Signature

Name: Gaze Of Temenos
Effect Text: Test Endurance (8+). Fail: Gain +3 @Danger, +3 @Fate and the [Dread|AL0299] Condition card. Then remove this card from the deck and draw another BP card. The will beyond wills looks into your heart and finds only fear

Name: Infuriating Roar
Effect Text: Each Titan gains +2 @Danger and +1 @Rage. Lose -1 @Refugees. @WoO Cyclonus moves to center of the Board

Name: Infuriating Roar
Effect Text: Each Titan gains +3 @Danger and +2 @Rage. WoO Cyclonus moves to center of the Board

Name: Terrorize
Effect Text: All Titans on Vantage Points suffer Displacement onto a Rear space and Knockdown. Lose -1 Humanity

Name: Imposter's Gaze
Effect Text: Steal 1 Mnemos node from each Titan.\nLose -1 @Progress token from the current Story card. If there are no @Progress tokens on the current Story card, gain +2 @Doom instead.\n@WoO Burden moves to the center of the Board

Name: Absorbed
Effect Text:
When you are Absorbed, place your Titan here. As long as you are Absorbed, you cannot move (voluntarily or involuntarily) and you attack as if you were on a VP.
*Indigestion*: If there are any Absorbed Titans, when the Chimera suffers a Secondary Stack Wound, place 1 generic token under each Titan miniature here. Then, if there are 2 or more generic tokens under a miniature, that Titan is regurgitated! Place their miniature on an empty space adjacent to the Chimera.
<End of Titan Round> Each Absorbed Titan gains 1 Ambrosia token and draws an Obol. Discard all generic tokens under the Absorbed Titans.
[Zeus|AQ0386] Godform has +1 @Power when Absorbed.
If you are ever Absorbed while being Absorbed, you die.
<End of Battle> Each still Absorbed Titan resolves the _Bellynaut_ Special Event

Name: In Media Res
Effect Text: Starting from the lowest @Fate and continuing in ascending order, Titans must draw and resolve a Minor, Major, and Grave Trauma (one card per Titan). Then remove this card from the Battle and draw another AI card. This card never escalates
FAQ: This card cannot be chain broken

Name: Skip Timeline
Effect Text: The Oracle moves 4 spaces towards the Timefront (stop if adjacent). Escalate 1. Gain +1 @Doom

Name: Omega Terminus
Effect Text:
While on this card, during your turn, you can only unexhaust and/or attack.
If you deal a Wound, place your Titan on a space adjacent to the Timefront in a straight line from the Oracle. If you fail to Wound, ignore responses.
At the end of your turn, if you're still in the Omega Terminus, you are erased from existence.
Zeus Godform gains +1 @Power here

Name: Icarian Shriek
Effect Text: Each Titan suffers {Bleeding 3}

Name: Auric Storm
Effect Text: Lose -1 @Crew. Each Titan gains 2 Midas tokens and 2 Ambrosia tokens

Name: Impaled
Effect Text: If you become Impaled, place your miniature on this card. During your turn you can either try to Get Free or attack. You can only use Melee Weapons. %Wound% If you deal a Wound, in addition to normal responses, create a VP (you stay Impaled)!\n*Get Free!:* @CombatAction Test @Endurance Endurance or @Fury Fury (9+). If you succeed, Displace.\n*End of your turn:* If you start your turn Impaled, {Midas 2}, then gain X+5 @Danger, where X is the number of Midas tokens you have, then resolve a Trauma Draw

Name: The Last Wish
Effect Text: All Titans die

Name: Wish Dissonance
Effect Text: Lose -1 @Crew and -1 @Hull. Random Titan dies

Name: The Last Wish
Effect Text:
*Start of Battle (Level 4+):*
Place this card at the bottom of the AI deck and never shuffle or discard it.

All Titans die

Name: Total Lunacy
Effect Text: *Staircase:* Disappears!\nRandom Titan dies

Name: Churning Black
Effect Text: Each Titan discard 1 Oxygen token and a @Gear card with the highest Ligh tX keyword. Then the Dragon of Phobos disappears (remove it from the Battle Board)

Name: Black Immolation
Effect Text: Each Titan discards 1 Oxygen token, suffers {Burn}, and gains 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Argo Burns
Effect Text: Lose -1 @Hull. Move Ur-Fleece 6 spaces on the Abyss Track

Name: Coming of Darkness
Effect Text: All Titans gain the [Terror|EL2596] Condition card. {Black March}. @WoO Black March

Name: Aether Suck
Effect Text: Remove all Aether tokens from each Titan. For every 4 tokens removed this way, perform Signature. If this ability didn't trigger, Blackbeak moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans, and performs AI

Name: Eyes on the Gleaming Prize
Effect Text: Titan X moves to the closest Board Edge; move all Titans 8 spaces in the opposite direction. Titan X turns to face the most Titans. Lose -1 @Crew and -1 @Hull

Name: Unreadable
Effect Text: As long as this Feint is in play, draw AI and BP cards form the bottom of the appropriate deck (and not the top). When you wound a BP III, after performing Escalation, shuffle the BP deck

Name: Overstep (I)
Effect Text: Shuffle the [Overstep BP I|ES3194] into the BP deck. Then, remove this card from the Feint deck

Name: Overstep (II)
Effect Text: Shuffle the [Overstep BP II|ES3195] into the BP deck. Then, remove this card from the Feint deck

Name: Riposte
Effect Text: As long as this Feint is in play, all your Attacks gain: "*Full Miss:* Titan X performs Signature against the Attacker"

Name: Met Your Match
Effect Text: As long as this Feint is in play, all your Attacks gain: "*Full Miss:* {Pain X}, where X is the top BP card's level"

Name: No Rules
Effect Text: As long as this Feint is in play, and you're in front of Titan X, ignore Opening and Closing tokens

Name: Blinding Lights
Effect Text: When this Feint is drawn, Titan goes for the _Argo_. Immediately discard 1 random Argo Ability from the Battle

Name: Mind Games
Effect Text: When this Feint is drawn, clear the Kratos Pool and place this card in the Kratos Pool. Then, the next time you would place tokens in the Kratos Pool, don't, but discard this card instead.\nIf this card was drawn as an effect of the AI 0, discard it and draw again

Name: Feint Injury
Effect Text: When this Feint is drawn, {Heal 1}. Then remove this card form the Feint deck. If this card was drawn as an effect of the AI 0, discard it and draw again

Name: Junction Seizure
Effect Text: When this Feint is drawn, if all Titans have 10+ Pain tokens combined, discard those tokens. Every Titan gains as much @Danger as they discard Pain tokens. If the Titans don't have 10+ Pain tokens, every Titan gains 2 Pain tokens instead

Name: Overstep
Effect Text: If you rolled a Crit Chance, immmediately end this Attack and discard this card. Otherwise, Chain Break. Then, Titan X immediately performs AI against you. Then, remove this card from the deck

Name: Overstep
Effect Text: If you rolled a Crit Chance, immmediately end this Attack and discard this card. Otherwise, Chain Break. Then, Titan X immediately performs AI against you. Then, remove this card from the deck
